name: Starship Infiltration VR
description:
Starship Infiltration is an Android VR Railing Shooter game, where we play as an agent who has to infiltrate enemy's ship. There is also boss battle in the end of the stage.

This game can also be played with joystick for the better experience.

Credits:

  • Lazuardi Ya'qub Affan (Programmer)
  • Bagus Himawan (Programmer)
  • Bima Panji Yudasmara (Programmer)
  • Prabu Dzaky (Programmer)
  • Ahmad Nagi (3D Art)
  • Chandra Ahmad Fauzi (3D Art)
  • Syahri Maulana Ramadhan (Music & SFX)
